nodes.bodyText: This is a perfect place to use a Switch statement instead of the if else chain.
Also, I wonder if there's a way you can simply include the LogLevel value in each MenuItem.
I did try to use a Switch statement instead of all the if else's, but resource IDs cannot be used in switch statements.
What's the purpose for setting the placeholder text first before setting it to getFilteredLogs?

In a previous PR Jameson commented that it would be helpful to display some placeholder text (i.e. "Search results will appear here...") in case it takes time to display the logs (#659 (comment)), although that comment was more related to when you initially navigate to the logs view. If it does take time to display the logs, I thought it could be helpful to display the placeholder text indicating that search results are being retrieved, otherwise it may seem like the search functionality is broken.
